msContents.summary: This manuscript is of Viṣṇupurāṇa. The first folio is broken. The first leaf has verses from end of the first chapter and beginning of the 2 chapter of the 1st aṃśa.

msItem.title: Viṣṇupurāṇa
msItem.incipit: yad vyālaṃ visphuṭacārukesarasaṭāsaṃhāraramyākṛtiḥ vakṣo vajraśilaṃ samūhakaṭhinaṃ vistāra devadviṣo bhinnaṃ yena nakhair mudes tu bhagavān de
msItem.explicit: pradiśatu bhagavān aśeṣapuṃsāṃ harir apajanmajarādikāṃ samṛddhim |
msItem.finalRubric: iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe ṣaṣṭhe ṃśe ṣṭame dhyāyaḥ |
msItem.colophon:
śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ |
hariḥ om karakṛtaṃ aparādham kṣantum arhanti santaḥ |

extent.measure: 7 guard folios, 114 written folios, 69 blank folios.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin but some folio are without foliation.
supportDesc.condition: Some folio have wormholes. Broken folio at the beginning. The blank folio at the end have water patches. Small white fungus spots are seen on the folio.

handNote.desc: Small clear hand writing but due to faint ink and patches of fungus reading is difficult.

additions.desc: Śrīviṣṇupurāṇam is written in the left margin of the first folio.
Number 49 is written on the front guard with pink pencil.

listBibl.bibl: The Critical Edition of the Viṣṇupurāṇam, critically edited by M. M. Pathak. Vadodara : Oriental Institute 1997-1999.

encodingDesc.p: Dots to show continuation of the text.

revisionDesc.change: Added the explicit and the colophon. Edited by Abhirami Prakasan

TEI.text:
yad vyālaṃ visphuṭacārukesarasaṭāsaṃhāraramyākṛtiḥ vakṣo vajraśilaṃ samūhakaṭhinaṃ vistāra devadviṣo bhinnaṃ yena nakhair mudes tu bhagavān de
maitreyaḥ paripapraccha praṇipatyābhivādya ca || tvatto hi vedādhyayanam
t prasādāt muni
nya taścaitaccarācaraṃ
munisattama devādīnāṃ tathā vaṃśān manu
pradiśatu bhagavān aśeṣapuṃsāṃ harir apajanmajarādikāṃ samṛddhim |
iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe ṣaṣṭhe ṃśe ṣṭame dhyāyaḥ | śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ |
hariḥ om karakṛtaṃ aparādham kṣantum arhanti santaḥ |
